comment.author: 62379908@N00
comment._content: When I was a kid, I lived in Fort Pierce from 1948 to 1951.  I remember hearing about Oscar Osteen.  However, I don't think I ever met him and can't remember why he was so well known.  Maybe it was because of his barbeque.
